items.sentence: Even though Tom knew that he\'d be teased about his height, he decided to try out for the basketball team.
It's difficult to love someone when it isn't clear whether or not the other person loves you the same way.
I know it's highly unlikely that you'd ever want to go out with me, but I still need to ask at least once.
I'd like to hold a staff meeting first thing tomorrow afternoon, so could you reserve the conference room?
There was a feeling of constraint in the room; no one dared to tell the king how foolish his decision was.
